reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, comfortable, and appreciate its feminine style, with one noting it provides warmth without bulk.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Jacket
items.body: Excellent jacket. Its meant for layering but still looks amazing and is comfortable. Read more
items.author: Reviewer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful retro style and excellent fit
items.body: This is my third Dale of Norway sweater and it doesn't disappoint. Since I already have a red and ivory (zip up) Dale sweater and a black and ivory (boxier, more traditional) one, I opted for the Cobalt/Off White/Allium for a brighter look. The pink detail around the zipper is a beautiful accent. As others mention, the sleeves are a bit long but it doesn't bother me much and I can easily roll them up if needed. As with other Dale sweaters, the fit is snug but not tight and the wool is very high quality and feminine-looking but still substantial. I wear S. I feel like you could put this sweater through hell and it would still look beautiful. Living in New England, this is an all-season sweater for me. I recently wore it on a trip to Denver and got all sorts of compliments from different people - just seeing the sweater got them excited about skiing. If you've never worn a Dale before you're in for a wonderful surprise. Read more
items.author: Annaconda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars size is true
items.body: outstanding. the color is vibrant Read more
items.author: Recent Reader

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sizing for smaller women
items.body: I'm between the XS and S sizes on the Dale of Norway sizing charts. Read every review that mentioned sizing but none really helped me with my decision. Why do most reviews mention weight and height, but never their bone structure (frame) and very seldom their body shape? I finally took a chance and ordered the XS. The sweater is form fit (or athletic fit) but stretches somewhat. I tried on the sweater with no base layer, then tried it on with my thickest/warmest long underwear since I'll be using it on our coldest ski days. Either way, it fits beautifully. All in all, the sweater is a piece of art - absolutely gorgeous. Worth every penny. I'll update my review as to warmth once I hit the slopes this season. FYI ... I'm an older 'gal', 5''2", 100 lbs, very small frame, athletic build but not straight up and down (i.e, you can tell I'm not a boy). Former gymnast but that was way back. Most of my pounds are bone and muscle. Hope this helps the smaller women out there. Read more
items.author: DoggieLady

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Arms too long and somewhat itchy but ok if over base layer.
items.body: Love the sweater. It is gorgeous but arms way too long and somewhat itchy which is ok if over a base layer. Read more
items.author: RFP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality!
items.body: Definitely worth the money- this is a quality sweater that will last forever. It is tightly knit and looks beautiful. Read more
items.author: Deanna Kelley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful design & workmanship - Made in Norway
items.body: This sweater is worth every penny. The quality is very high. It is a nice warm sweater, not bulky or thick but comfortably fitting and the workmanship is outstanding. Will definitely buy more from your collection and highly recommend. So pleased. Read more
items.author: Doobie Do

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: If purple is your color you will love this sweater. Very nice fit and seems to be true to size Read more
items.author: Thomas Burtard

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Offwhite, Raspberry/Off White/Navy, Cobalt/Off White/Allium, Navy/Off White/Raspberry, Allium/Off White/Schiefer, Lightcharcoal Smoke Offwhite, Metal Grey/Schiefer/Allium, Peacock Offwhite, Black Smoke Offwhite, Navy Red Rose Offwhite. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
